name: Backer Reward
description:
In Backer Reward, you play someone who's backed an unfinished Kickstarter game. The developers are calling you, asking what you want in the game.

Do you want an action game or an epic narrative? Whatever you choose will appear. You design the game as you play it.

Backer Reward uses video and animated photographs. The game and the developer video calls get weirder with every choice the player makes.

Backer Reward won the Best Use of Theme and Best Overall Game awards at the 2015 Global Game Jam in Brooklyn.
